```{r}
VideoLessons <- data.frame(read_csv("./R Workshop Video Links.csv", col_names = FALSE))
names(VideoLessons)<-VideoLessons[2,]
VideoLessons<-VideoLessons[-c(1:3),]
VideoLessons<-VideoLessons[!(is.na(VideoLessons$Topic)),]
VideoLessons0 <- VideoLessons
for (i in 1:length(unique(VideoLessons$Topic))){
  if (sum(VideoLessons$Topic %in% unique(VideoLessons$Topic)[i])>1) {
    VideoLessons$Topic[VideoLessons$Topic %in% unique(VideoLessons$Topic)[i]]<-
      paste0(VideoLessons$Topic[VideoLessons$Topic %in% 
                                  unique(VideoLessons$Topic)[i]], 
             " (Part ", 1:sum(VideoLessons$Topic %in% unique(VideoLessons$Topic)[i]), ")")
  }
}

VideoLessons$NeedToKnow<-c(paste0("Importance Level: ",VideoLessons$`Importance Level`[1]), VideoLessons$`Importance Level`[-1])

VideoLessons$Notes<-gsub(pattern = '"', replacement = "'", x = VideoLessons$Notes)

VideoLessons$Notes0<-paste0('tags$li(
                            tags$p("Fun-ness: ', VideoLessons$`Fun-ness`, '"),
                            tags$p("Suggested For: ', VideoLessons$`Suggested for`, '"),',
                            ifelse(is.na(VideoLessons$Notes), "",
                                             paste0('
                                             tags$p("', VideoLessons$Notes, '"),
                                             ')),
                            'tags$a(href="', VideoLessons$`Video Link`, '", "Video Link"))')

VideoLessons$Title<-(VideoLessons$Topic)
VideoLessons$Authors<-"Aaron Mamula"
VideoLessons<-data.frame(VideoLessons)
rownames(VideoLessons)<-1:nrow(VideoLessons)
```

```{js}
function main() {
  $('.schedule').hide();
  $('.schedule').fadeIn(2000);
  $('.workshops').hide();
  $('.workshops-button').on('click', function() {
    $(this).next().slideToggle(400);
    $(this).toggleClass('active');
  });
}
 
$(document).ready(main);
```

counter<-3

##  `r unique(VideoLessons$Playlist.Title)[counter]` 
[Playlist](` r unique(VideoLessons$Playlist)[counter] `)


```{r}



program1<-VideoLessons[VideoLessons$Playlist.Title %in% unique(VideoLessons$Playlist.Title)[counter],]

div(
  class = "schedule",
  apply(program1, 1, function(event) {
    div(
      class = "limit",
      div(class = "workshops-button", 
          div(class = "left-date", 
              # (eval(parse(text=event[['NeedToKnow']])))),
              event[['NeedToKnow']]),
          div(class = "center-title", 
              # tags$i(event[['Title']])),
              tags$b(event[['Title']])),
          div(class = "right-authors",
              event[['Authors']])),
      tags$ul(class = "workshops",
              (eval(parse(text=event[["Notes0"]])) ) )
              # event[["Notes"]])
    )
  })
)

counter<-counter + 1
```
